author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:
As there is renewed interest within the Tracker DPG about using Beam Halo tracks for tracker alignment purposes during Run 3, and we currently have only a configuration from run1 in the matrix, we would like to propose an updated version using the 2018 detector (which at least features the phase-1 pixel detector) 

#### PR validation:
within `CMSSW_10_6_X_2019-04-23-1100` the command:
```bash
runTheMatrix.py -l 8.2
```
runs to completion, producing 10 events in `RECO` data-tier.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This is not a backport

@mtosi @adewit @connorpa
title: Introduce relval worflow for beam-halo in 2018 detector configuration
